code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const tabs=['Home','Apps','Docs','Feeds','Business','Academy'];const Header=()=>{const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"bg-white shadow-md px-6 py-3 flex justify-between items-center sticky top-0 z-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/image.png",alt:"Retail Link",className:"h-8 mr-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"flex space-x-6",children:tabs.map(tab=>{const path=tab.toLowerCase();const isActive=location.pathname===`/${path}`||tab==='Home'&&location.pathname==='/';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:tab==='Home'?'/':`/${path}`,className:`pb-1 border-b-2 text-sm font-medium ${isActive?'text-blue-600 border-blue-600':'text-gray-700 border-transparent'} hover:text-blue-600`,children:tab},tab);})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search...",className:"border rounded px-3 py-1 text-sm focus:outline-none"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xl",children:"\u2753 \uD83D\uDD14 \u2699\uFE0F \u2B50 \uD83C\uDDFA\uD83C\uDDF8 \uD83D\uDC64"})]})]});};export default Header;
